name: Kessler Syndrome (Starbuck5)
description: You've been framed for huge crimes you didn't commit! As punishment, you have been exiled to space to clean up orbital debris. But you're clever, and by looting the satellites you're supposed to pick up, you slowly become a powerful force. Then, revenge! An opportunity arises for you to expose your framer, the president of the world, and you take it.
